sentence.Network_cn: 他安慰地捏了捏她的胳膊。
他轻拍她的膝盖让她放心.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 综合英语单词表(第二册上) - 豆丁网 ... reasonably ad. 合理地 reassuringly ad. 安慰地 refuge n. 避难所.
and as reassuringly , America is encouraging it in this .同样令人放心的是，美国也鼓励中国的这种做法。
The prime minister pointed reassuringly to the silence of the British press ., 首相令人信服地指出英国新闻媒体的沉默.
中国国际广播电台译 5. reassuringly:安心地、可靠地 6. standoff:僵局 7. bullhorn:手提式扩音器 8. press charge:上诉 9. candidacy:候选资格.

list.abs: The prime minister pointed reassuringly to the silence of the British press ., 首相令人信服地指出英国新闻媒体的沉默.
on questions of policy , the views of the candidates were as reassuringly similar as their backgrounds were exhilaratingly different .在政策问题上，尽管这些候选人的背景各不相同（令人振奋)，但他们的观点却十分相似（让人放心)。
fix provisionally 临时地安排fix reassuringly 令人安心地凝视fix recently 最近地安排

entry.tran: (语言或动作）令人放心的，令人欣慰的
entry.def: If you find some-one's words or actions reassuring, they make you feel less worried about something.

example.ex: It was reassuring to hear John's familiar voice...
example.tran: 听到约翰熟悉的声音让人放心。

example.ex: She gave me some reassuring news.
example.tran: 她告诉了我一些令我欣慰的消息。

sentences.sentence: "the prime minister pointed reassuringly to the silence of the British press"

auth_sentence.content: But he kept singing or speaking reassuringly.

sentences.cn: 他轻拍她的膝盖让她放心。
医生笑了笑， 让人心里很踏实。
